document.full_text: some 3,000 protesters took to the streets after friday prayers in oman's southern port of salalah in one of the biggest pro-reform demonstrations since scattered unrest began in the sultanate two months ago.
document.title: protester's stage large oman pro-reform demo
lines_and_colors: some 3,000 protesters took to the streets after friday prayers in oman's southern port of salalah in one of the biggest pro-reform demonstrations since scattered unrest began in the sultanate two months ago.
